articles.description: Reaction as Real Madrid & Atalanta play in the Uefa Super Cup, plus Premier League build-up with just one day to go until the start of the season.
articles.title: Super Cup & EFL Cup reaction, Premier League build-up and transfer latest

articles.description: We ask 30 BBC Sport football pundits to predict who will win the Premier League title, and which clubs will finish in the top four this season.
articles.title: Premier League predictions 2024-25: BBC Sport pundits pick their top four

articles.description: Arsenal are in talks with Real Sociedad about signing midfielder Mikel Merino, who played in all of Spain's seven games at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Arsenal transfer news: Mikel Merino talks ongoing with Real Sociedad as Gunners target midfielder

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe says there is "no limit" on what he and Real Madrid can achieve together after he scored on his debut against Atalanta to help the club win a record sixth Uefa Super Cup.
articles.title: A trophy, a goal and 'no limit' - Madrid's Mbappe era begins

articles.description: Nineteen years and 10 miles separated Zambia's football team from a lost, golden generation on a fateful night in Libreville.
articles.title: Zambia: The 1993 air crash and the 2012 Afcon underdogs

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Kalvin Phillips is set to join newly promoted Ipswich Town on loan for the season.
articles.title: Kalvin Phillips: Ipswich set to sign Man City midfielder on season-long loan

articles.description: A petition calling for breakdancer Raygun to apologise contains 'falsehoods aimed at inciting hatred against her', says the Australian Olympic Committee.
articles.title: Raygun: Petition calling for Australian breakdancer to apologise criticised by Australian Olympic Committee

articles.description: The Indian cricket board says it will not step in to host the 2024 Women's T20 World Cup if it has to be moved from Bangladesh.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup 2024: India will not step in to host tournament if moved from Bangladesh

articles.description: Parma are back in Serie A but, after turbulent times, are one of Italy's most iconic sides now here to stay?
articles.title: Parma back in Serie A: Great Italian name on the rise again after turbulent times

articles.description: Newcastle United say Sandro Tonali will be available again from 28 August following a 10-month ban for breaching betting rules.
articles.title: Sandro Tonali: Newcastle player's 10-month ban ends on 28 August
